title: 88cric
author: 88cric
content: 88cric is one of the newer platforms in the market but this platform offers tough competition to the other brands who have been in the market for a longer period. 88cric not only caters to satisfy the needs of online casino game players but also bettors who like placing bets on sports. this site offers an extremely broad range of sports markets to bet on as well. furthermore, this site considers player security their topmost priority, with the proper license and use of the top SSL encryption technology the data is always protected. Additionally, with the availability of service agents around the clock, it is safe to say that 88cric is the best platform for sports betting and online casino games.https://88cric.com/

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Based on a quick research I did, it's hard to trust this site, I learnt that the domain was is now 2 years old, checked this on scam adviser, and out of 100, this site have a score rating of just 1, this is way below what well known scam sites sometimes score.And again, I did check the site out, there is no much stuff to view without registration I guess, as the registration form pops up upon every thing I click, not interesting to be honest.And I did read some reviews and most previous customers (I believe) say that the site only takes deposit but will never allow users withdraw, as they will always find one reason or the other not to process user's withdrawal requests.I personally will avoid this casino for now, maybe op can take the extra step of getting a copper membership, and creating a more professional ann thread of his casino, and possibly launch a marketing campaign on this forum, to prove he is here for serious business and not looking for potential victims.
